content.query:
--select database
use nyc_taxi_discovery

--query  file
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS trip_data


--query subfolders to see what type of error we get
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/year=2020',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS trip_data


---see the datatypes
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    ) AS trip_data'


--specifying explicitly datatypes using with clause
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) 
    WITH(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag VARCHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
        year VARCHAR(4),
        month VARCHAR(2)
    )AS trip_data



EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_delta/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
    )
    WITH(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag VARCHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
        year VARCHAR(4),
        month VARCHAR(2)
    ) AS trip_data'
